name: youtube-fresh-videos
title: Youtube Fresh Videos
description: Stay up to date with your favorite YouTube channels
author: yoan_bernabeu

commands.name: latest-videos
commands.title: Last Video
commands.description: View latest videos from your followed channels

commands.name: add-channel
commands.title: Add Channel
commands.description: Add a new YouTube channel to follow

commands.name: manage-channels
commands.title: Manage Channels
commands.description: View and manage followed YouTube channels

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
